messages.content: are all the angles equal in a parallelogram
No, in a parallelogram, opposite angles are equal, while adjacent angles are supplementary.
can you own a skunk in the uk
No, owning a skunk in the UK is illegal.
can an x be used as a signature
No, it's not advisable as it doesn't authenticate identity.
is a father in law considered a relative
Yes, a father-in-law is indeed considered a relative.
is the isle of man part of the european economic area
No, it is not part of the European Economic Area.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel is not part of the European Economic Area.
is st kitts and nevis a us territory
No, it is an independent country, not a US territory.
do they still have drive in movies in america
Yes, drive-in theaters are still operational and popular in America.
does a fried egg have a runny yolk
Typically, a fried egg may have a runny yolk if cooked sunny-side-up or over-easy.
has there ever been a shooting at a hospital
Yes, although such events are extremely rare.
